Package index

Assembly

Assemble a chronogram, or add new data.

cg_assemble()
Wrapper to assemble chronogram
cg_add_experiment()
A helper function to add experimental data to a chronogram
cg_add_treatment()
A helper function to add treatment data to a chronogram

Annotate

Annotate a chronogram

cg_annotate_antigenic_history()
Calculate and assign flags based on infection history
cg_annotate_episodes_count()
Calculate and assign flags based on infection history
cg_annotate_episodes_fill()
Find infections per individual
cg_annotate_episodes_find()
Find infections per individual
cg_annotate_episodes_find_seroconversion()
Find seroconversion episodes per individual
cg_annotate_exposures_count()
Cumulative counting seroconversion episodes per individual
cg_annotate_vaccines_count()
Calculate and assign flags based on vaccine history

Filter, window & select

Sub-cohort a chronogram

cg_window_by_episode()
Take a window of dates from a chronogram: with respect to episode start.
cg_window_by_metadata()
Take a window of dates from a chronogram
cg_window_by_visit()
Take a window of dates from a chronogram: with respect to visits.
cg_select_visit()
Select a visit within a windowed chronogram

IO

cg_save()
A helper function to save a chronogram
cg_load()
A helper function to load a chronogram
